talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Since I completed the errand, I am going to go find Argenta!
Hey you, steadily listen to Geraint's word!
(You must return to the Royal Castle.)

$Geraint$
I heard someone in the Royal Castle mentioned about your name.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I told Elite Soldier already, but how come it's not here yet? The adventurer...

$Elite Soldier$
Hmm.. Should be soon.

$Geraint$
I heard someone in the Royal Castle mentioned about your name.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I told Elite Soldier already, but how come it's not here yet? The adventurer...
(It seems like Heraldry Scholar Stas is waiting for someone.)

$Adventurer David$
Since I had finished the errand I am going to look for Argenta. Hey you, steadily listen to Geraint's word!
(You must return to the Royal Castle.)

$Elite Soldier${action:Talk}
Oh! You there! I was just about to look for you.
Someone wants to meet up with you, {user_nick}.

$Elite Soldier$
You are correct. He need a favor from someone like you and cant be any other adventurer.
He wanted to ask you about the research that he is working on.

$Elite Soldier$
His name is Heraldry Scholar Stas. To tell you the truth, he is actually researching dragons. That is why he wanted to see you.

$Elite Soldier${action:Talk}
Have you met Heraldry Scholar Stas yet?
He wanted to see you because he has been researching dragons for a long time.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
You are finally here. I was desperately waiting for you.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
I know the information has not been announced to the pulic yet. But since I often go to the Royal Castle to take care of my personal matter, I hear lots of stories.
So I heard the Royal Castle has currently...
(Heraldry Scholar Stas is looking around.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay. So what would you want me to do?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Those Elite Soldiers are bothering me.
Could you do me a favor first? It is very simple.
I will tell you more once you finish my favor.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Could you get me one Dark Elf's Necklace at Road to Death City? I would appreciate it if you get me the necklace from Impostor Karen, not from normal dark elves.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I have to ask you something, but this is not a good time. Could you get me one Dark Elf's Necklace at Road to Death City. I would appreciate it if the necklace is from Impostor Karen.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What is the one that you wanted to ask me about?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
You are back. You may pass me the necklace.
Many strong and smart monsters are appearing at the Road to Death City because you have to go through the Road to Death City to go to Dark Elves's city. Therefore, those monsters are worth enough to research.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
(Heraldry Scholar Stas is looking around.)
Hm... (He is whispering to you.)
I heard the Gold Dragon stays in the Royal Castle's Underground and it is guarding the Prophet. Is that true?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Heraldry Scholar Stas is making sarcastic remarks.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
No, not yet. There are a few rumors going around inside the troops who went to Dark Overlord Keep Gates. But the military and the Royal Castle are controlling pretty well. Probably, Duke Stuart will edit a few impressive story top of the original story to look better and announce to people.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
What a bunch of fools. The dragon cannot be measured with humans standard. I don't know if you know but the six heroes did the same thing 50 years ago.
The six heroes were all agitated when they saw the Gold Dragon even though the Gold Dragon was their colleague who fought monsters together.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Lady Karacule and Barnac were mad about his betrayal.
Humans became so chaotic so they conceal the truth that the leader of six heroes, Geraint was the Gold Dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Heraldry Scholar Stas grab your shoulder with a pair of glowing eyes)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Actually, I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw it. So I started to research on dragons. But I noticed that as I research more about dragons, I am just descending into the fog. Which is true because I didn't have the cleared information. So with respect to the fact...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I guess... I will go talk to him.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I finally meet a person who can speak with the Dragon?! This is a rare sight and is not a common opportunity in my life!
So could you go talk to Geraint and get answers from these questions? Please!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How is it made...? What do you mean?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Thank you very much!
(Heraldry Scholar Stas hugs you with tears in his eyes.)
Then, please go ask him about how the dragon is made.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I think the black dragon this time and 50 years ago is the artificial dragon that made by power of Ancients. It was just my thoughts but I recently found that my hypothesis might be true. So I would like to know if other Dragons are made by power of Ancients as well.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
So please ask the Gold Dragon about these following questions.
Do all dragons are being made artificially? Is it possible to combine dragons by using the power of Ancients to make stronger dragons Like the Black Dragon?

$Geraint$
Human are doubtful of everything, unless they seen it with their own eyes. But they are fooled by stupid lies and they rely too much on their delusion and emotion.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I would like to hear it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I remembered what this guys had said.
I can sincerely explain to you. But I don't know if the information can be fully delivered to humans.

$Geraint$
Originally the Black Dragon was a part of broken cerebrates from the Chaos Dragon. The Black Dragon was a forced creation from power of Ancients.
In humans expression, the black dragon is artificial.

$Geraint$
But we, me and Argenta, are born from the Sentinel Dragon when the Sentinel Dragon divided into two. So we are not the forced creation.

$Geraint$
In the beginning Goddess Altea, who is the world mediator, created two dragons, Sentinel and Chaos.

$Geraint$
The creation of Goddess Altea, the world was living in peace under Ancients good deed. The world was also protected by two dragons. But because of Goddess Vestinel, who was jealous of Altea, the darkness descended on peaceful city, Lagendia.

$Geraint$
When Goddess Altea drank Vestinel's poison, the good deed Ancients became contaminated by darkness and Ancients became corrupted. The evil Beyond Dragon who came from Vestinel's Mist Land, started to destroy Lagendia.

$Geraint$
Sentinel and Chaos barely defeated the Beyond Dragon. But the Chaos dragon got contaminated by Beyond's evil energy.

$Geraint$
When corrupted Chaos threats the world once again, Sentinel tried to stop Chaos. And the epic battle has started.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So you and Argenta are the descendant of Sentinel, am I right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Nobody won... The aftermath of battle, Chaos's body divided into many and spread all over the world. The Sentinel Dragon was also spent too much power so itself divided into two and prepared for the future.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It sounds it happened a very long time ago.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Yes, you are right. Me and Argenta are siblings who were born from the Sentinel Dragon. We are called to stop the resurrection of Chaos's cerebrates.

$Geraint$
A very long time ago...?
Hm... I don't know what humans are thinking about the time.
Anyway, did I clear all of your curiosity?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then is there no possibility that dragons are going to awake?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
50 years ago, starting from the Black Dragon, we found Chaos's cerebrates and seal them. Luckily, none of dragons were awaken.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Can you and Argenta become the one again?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Unfortunately, my power was not enough to destroy all the cerebrates.
If me and Argenta become the one again, then it might be possible to destroy all of them.
Anyway, don't worry because those seals will never be broken as long as I am here.

$Geraint$
Hm...
We are not sure unless we try, but I think it's possible.
But, we cannot be the one because she needs to support Monolith...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay... Then, do all dragons have the similar power?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It's not necessary for you and people to remember.
I should fOgret about it too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't know Argenta is that strong. But last time she was...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I'm not sure. But when me and Argenta are born from Sentinel, Argenta took almost every power. She is still at least three times stronger than me. I think each Chaos's cerebrates also has different power.

$Geraint$
Argenta cannot use her true power.
As I told you earlier, she is using her majority powers to support Monolith. I think I gave you the enough information.
You should go now.

$Geraint$
You should go back to a guy who is waiting for your answers.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Did you get answers from Gerrrant?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I see. I didn't know the Black Dragon was one of Broken Pieces of Chaos's Dragon...
So it can be created anytime as long as the core of cerebrates is not destroyed.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Hm... Thank you for the valuable information.
I really wanted to meet and talk to him in person, but I don't want to be ashamed.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
I couldn't be on his side after the battle 50 years ago. When he disappeared without saying anything, I was very angry, shocked, and collapsed. I couldn't look at reality correctly.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It looks like you have been worried about this for a long time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
As a Scholar, I should have said what I saw. Because if people are confused about something, they tend to conceal and fOgret about what happened. Therefore, when the Six Heroes are known for just the Six Heroes, nothing more, I should have said what I saw.
...I should have said what I saw.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Royal Castle's Task
journal.contents:
You have no more of Adventurer David's request. Return to the Royal Castle and look for other task.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier
journal.destination: Talk to Elite Soldier at the Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Please return to the Royal Castle and look for other task.

journal.title: Heraldry Scholar Stas's Call
journal.contents:
Heraldry Scholar Stas has been looking for you. Go to Heraldry Scholar Stas and talk to him what it is about.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas

journal.title: Dark Elf Necklace
journal.contents:
Heraldry Scholar Stas didn't talk about it. Instead he gave you an errand. It seems like he wants to talk to you about something when no one is around. As of his request, collect Dark Elf's Necklace at Dying City Crossroads.

Hermalte Port (Dark Mines Access) → Road to Death City
journal.todo_msg: Please collect Dark Elf's Necklace at Dying City Crossroads.

journal.title: Heraldry Scholar Stas's Question
journal.contents:
You have been collected Dark Elf's Necklace. Report to Heraldry Scholar Stas and listen to his story.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver Dark Elf's Necklace to Heraldry Scholar Stas.

journal.title: A Created Dragon?
journal.contents:
Heraldry Scholar Stas wanted to ask Geraint something about the Dragon. Deliver Heraldry Scholar Stas's questions to Geraint.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver Heraldry Scholar Stas's questions to Geraint.

journal.title: Two Different Dragons
journal.contents:
Return to Heraldry Scholar Stas and deliver Geraint's answer.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver Geraint's answer to Heraldry Scholar Stas.
